description: This table contains the history of locations where furcation is present on a tooth.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the furcation finding record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_FINDING_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple furcation locations associated with the finding and the historical instant from the DENTAL_FINDING_HX table

columns.name: DENT_FURC_LOC_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The history of locations where furcation is present on a tooth.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Buccal


Lingual


Mesial


Distal


Mesiolingual


Distolingual
